phase_history.notes: Creative brief and parameter spec authored.
High-complexity phased architecture selected.
skill_plan package accepted: ADR-0002/0003/0004/0005 and scene-state-contract authored; research synthesis aligned for skill_design and skill_impl handoff.
WebView design refreshed to v3: persistent viewport invariants and adaptive per-mode control rail behavior (width tokens + scroll memory) documented and aligned to preview/implementation shell.
Implementation phases 2.1-2.6 are complete. Phase 2.4 acceptance is now closed via deterministic probe plus suite evidence; Phase 2.5/2.6 acceptance and host-load checks remain stable.
Phase 2.1-2.3 validation completed: harness ctest 45/45 passed, LocusQ smoke suite 4/4 passed, pluginval GUI-context SUCCESS evidence captured.
Phase 2.4 acceptance closed: deterministic physics probe 5/5 pass, physics spatial-motion + zero-g drift scenarios pass, and phase-pure suite rollup 2 PASS / 0 WARN / 0 FAIL.
Phase 2.5 acceptance suite passed hard gates (9 scenarios: 8 pass, 1 warn, 0 fail). Residual warning tracks allocation trend under profiler while CPU budget/deadline criteria pass.

Phase 2.6 closeout validated (historical baseline): acceptance suite hard-pass (2 PASS / 1 WARN / 0 FAIL) with allocation warning. Superseded by implementation_phase_2_6c_allocation_free (3 PASS / 0 WARN / 0 FAIL, perf_allocation_free=true).
Documentation baseline standardized: metadata headers, standards/invariants/ADR references, and validation trend logging.

Harness sanity passed (45/45). Focused acceptance matrix executed (Phase 2.6 + Phase 2.5 regression + full-system + host-edge), with PASS_WITH_WARNING and published deltas in qa_output/suite_result.json.

Local macOS ship complete from universal (x86_64+arm64) release build. Packaged VST3/AU/Standalone into dist/LocusQ-v0.1.0-macOS with BUILD_MANIFEST + archive and verified pluginval/standalone smoke on ship artifacts.
Post-ship UI runtime recovery started to restore host interactivity when viewport/WebGL init fails.
Harness-first UI interaction smoke matrix executed (DSP/host proxy coverage). Result PASS_WITH_WARNING with stable suite counts and allocation warning trend retained.
Manual host UI acceptance checklist created; awaiting user-run DAW verification for 2.7a closeout.

Viewport interactivity and calibration visualization wiring landed: state-backed emitter pick/select/move with APVTS drag updates, local emitter identity in scene snapshots, and calibration speaker-level/profile visualization from native status payloads.
Harness-first full acceptance rerun completed (DSP + host + UI proxy matrix). PASS_WITH_WARNING with only allocation trend warning; manual host UI checklist deferred to 2026-02-20 per user.
UI control-path/state-sync closure refreshed with fresh evidence logs: JS syntax gate PASS, VST3 rebuild PASS, smoke suite PASS (4/4), and animation smoke PASS.
Phase 2.6c allocation-free pass complete: full-system CPU scenario now passes perf_allocation_free=true with zero allocations; phase 2.6 acceptance suite moved to PASS (3/3).
ADR-0005 accepted: closeout docs freshness gate locked. Routing/automation decisions reconfirmed and canonical status/evidence/readme/changelog sync required for phase closeout.

Host-interaction closure prep complete: Cartesian viewport drag now writes APVTS Cartesian coordinates via new pos_x/pos_y/pos_z relays+attachments; timeline native bridge now rejects non-finite time and clamps to duration; focused headless JS/build/smoke/animation/suite/host-edge checks all pass.

Pluginval automation segfault mitigation landed: mode-transition scene registration sync and safer emitter unregister semantics remove stale emitter audio-pointer reads; deterministic seed 0x2a331c6 now passes.
Expanded processor bus-layout support to mono/stereo/quad output (including discrete(4)) and validated renderer/smoke runs in 4-channel QA mode.
Added explicit quad output channel mapping (FL, FR, RL, RR), scene-state output-layout telemetry, and stereo/quad regression suites.
QA harness CI now includes explicit 4-channel host-edge/full-system matrix coverage and a seeded pluginval stress lane on macOS.
Renderer now applies per-block emitter budget culling + activity gates with deterministic ordering under load; scene-state telemetry and high-emitter QA stress coverage are in place and passing.

Snapshot/preset compatibility hardening landed: snapshot layout schema metadata persisted + restore-time migration for legacy/mismatched layout payloads, emitter preset schema v2 added with v1 compatibility, and dedicated stereo/quad migration QA checks pass.

Renderer guardrail trend coverage expanded with final-quality high-emitter stress and a rollup suite across 48k/512 and 96k/512 in both 2ch/4ch runtime modes; all runs are deadline-safe and allocation-free.

Expanded snapshot migration QA matrix coverage across mono/stereo/quad runtime layouts by adding explicit metadata-forcing modes (mono/stereo/quad + legacy strip), new mismatch scenarios, and dedicated 1ch/2ch/4ch suite passes.

Harness sanity and host validation passed, but non-manual acceptance matrix failed due reproducible phase 2.5 room-depth signal-present regression; phase 2.8 stereo/quad suites also emitted attenuation-level warnings.
Post-fix non-manual acceptance matrix rerun is clear of hard failures after restoring phase 2.5 room-depth signal margin; only known phase 2.8 stereo/quad attenuation soft warnings remain.

pluginval_results.output_summary: Strictness-5 in-process pluginval run passed during post-fix non-manual acceptance matrix rerun.
pluginval_results.environment_note: In restricted/headless contexts, pluginval may abort in AppKit/HIServices before plugin load; classify as environment_blocked when observed.

validation.implementation_phase_2_4_status_note: Acceptance closed: deterministic physics probe (5/5), physics spatial-motion and zero-g drift scenarios (PASS), and phase-pure phase 2.4 suite rollup (2 PASS / 0 WARN / 0 FAIL).
validation.implementation_phase_2_5_status_note: Phase 2.5 acceptance suite executed with scenario-level perceptual proxies and real perf profiling. Hard gates passed; allocation tracking remains a warning for trending.

qa_phase_2_5_acceptance_results.warning_detail: Residual warning trend preserved; no hard-gate regressions in focused matrix run.

validation.implementation_phase_2_6_status_note: Phase 2.6 acceptance is closed with allocation-free full-system criteria now passing. Full-system 8-emitter draft CPU gate passes deadline + avg/p95 block-time and perf_allocation_free=true. Host edge lifecycle matrix remains pass across SR/BS variants, and plugin build/pluginval/standalone checks remain stable.
validation.implementation_phase_2_7a_status_note: Bootstrap hardening + UI proxy matrix complete; 2.7b viewport/calibration, 2.7c control-path/state-sync, and 2.7d Cartesian viewport/timeline guard hardening are landed; manual in-host DAW UI checklist is still pending to close 2.7.
validation.implementation_phase_2_7b_status_note: Phase 2.7b implementation landed: viewport emitter pick/select/move is wired to APVTS position parameters, calibration speaker/meter/profile visuals are now driven by native calibration status data, and post-change smoke regression suite passed (4/4).
validation.implementation_phase_2_7c_status_note: Phase 2.7c control-path/state-sync closure validated on refreshed run: tabs/toggles/dropdowns/value steppers remain relay-backed, UI-state persistence bridge remains active, and 2.7c JS/build/smoke/animation evidence is green.
validation.implementation_phase_2_6c_status_note: Audio-thread allocation warning removed for phase 2.6 full-system path: perf_total_allocations=0 and perf_allocation_free=true in allocation probe and official full-system scenario.
validation.implementation_phase_2_7d_status_note: Phase 2.7d control-path closure remains validated; 2.7e added pluginval automation guard (mode-transition registration sync) and deterministic seed repro now passes.
implementation_phase_2_7d_manual_host_on: DAW-embedded tab/rail interaction focus and host-automation behavior
Viewport drag persistence/feel in Cartesian mode under embedded WebView input routing
Calibration START/ABORT lifecycle with real DAW I/O routing and profile-ready persistence
validation.implementation_phase_2_8_status_note: Processor bus-layout validation now accepts mono/stereo input with mono/stereo/quad output; focused 4-channel renderer and smoke checks passed.
validation.implementation_phase_2_8b_status_note: Explicit quad output map + output-layout telemetry + mono/stereo/quad regression suites landed and passed.
validation.implementation_phase_2_9_status_note: CI workflow expanded: qa-critical now runs explicit quad matrix scenarios and qa-pluginval-seeded-stress runs deterministic strictness-5 seeded sweeps (0x2a331c6..0x2a331ca).
validation.implementation_phase_2_10_status_note: Spatial renderer now enforces a deterministic top-priority 8-emitter per-block budget with near-silence culling and telemetry exposure; baseline/high-emitter/suite/smoke scenarios all pass allocation-free gates.
validation.implementation_phase_2_10b_status_note: Renderer CPU trend coverage now includes final-quality high-emitter stress and rollup-suite matrix runs at 48k/512 + 96k/512 in 2ch/4ch; all runs pass deadline and allocation-free gates.
validation.implementation_phase_2_11_status_note: Snapshot and preset compatibility now includes output-layout schema metadata persistence, restore-time migration for legacy/mismatched layouts, and QA migration checks in stereo + quad runtime paths.
validation.implementation_phase_2_11b_status_note: Snapshot migration emulation now spans legacy-strip plus forced mono/stereo/quad metadata, and dedicated mono/stereo/quad runtime matrix suites all pass for layout-mismatch state-roundtrip coverage.

test_non_manual_acceptance_matrix_post_2.resolved_regression: locusq_25_room_depth_no_coloring signal_present restored to rms=-78.2862 dBFS (min -80.0 dBFS)

framework_selection.rationale: 3D spatial visualization requires WebGL (Three.js). Complex multi-mode UI (calibration wizard, keyframe editor, 3D viewport) is far more practical in HTML/JS. Keeps the 3D layer modular and replaceable as requested.
